```{r, out.width="90%"}
skills_bar <- function(){
  tibble(
    order = c(1, 2, 3, 4 ,5 , 6, 7),
    language = c("R", "Python", "SQL", "Cypher", "JavaScript", "HTML/CSS", "Bash"),
    skill = c(5, 3.5, 5, 2, 3, 3.5, 3)
  ) |>
    mutate(max = 5) |>
    ggplot(aes(x = max, y = reorder(language, -order), width = .6)) +
    geom_col(fill = "grey85") +
    geom_col(aes(x = skill), fill = "grey15") +
    theme_void() +
    labs(y = "Language") +
    theme(
      axis.text.y = element_text(size = 52, family = "roboto_slab", face = "bold", color = "black", hjust = 1),
      plot.background = element_rect(fill = "#F5FEFD", color = "#F5FEFD"),
      panel.background = element_rect(fill = "#F5FEFD", color = "#F5FEFD")
    )
}
skills_bar()
```
